description: An interchange format, used primarily for exchange of a single layer of gridded or raster data between software programs.  The file contents represents a single measure for each cell in a rectangular grid.  All numbers are expressed in ASCII characters.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">asc</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: ESRI ArcInfo ASCII Grid
